section.entry: Provera za konverziju sa gubicima u konveziju bez gubitaka

entry.string: Some error occurred trying to connect to the freedb server.

section.entry: Molimo, pre prijave, popunite sva polja i nazive.

entry.string: No freedb entry for this disk.

section.entry: Nema podatka u freedb bazi za ovaj disk.

section.entry: Izaberite podatak koji najviše odgovara Vašem CD-u

entry.string: Would you like to perform this query again later?

section.entry: Želite li da kasnije ponovite ovaj upit?

entry.string: Would you like to perform the remaining queries again later?

section.entry: Želite li da kasnije ponovite preostale upite?

entry.string: Some error occurred trying to connect to the freedb server.

section.entry: Pojavila se greška prilikom povezivanja sa freedb serverom.

section.entry: Odaberi folder za smeštaj enkodovanih fajlova

section.entry: Ako je moguće koristi ulazni folder
Ukloni obrađene pesme sa liste zadataka
Dodaj enkodovane fajlove na listu zadataka

section.entry: Dodaj sekvencijalne brojeve u inače iste nazive fajlova

entry.string: Keep time stamps of source files

entry.string: The output folder does not exist! Do you want to create it?

section.entry: Izlazni folder ne postoji! Da li ga želite kreirati?

section.name: Playlists

entry.string: Select the folder in which the playlist files will be placed

section.entry: Izaberi folder u koji će se smeštati fajlovi sa liste

entry.string: Create only a single playlist and/or cue sheet file per conversion

section.entry: Napravi samo jednu listu pokretanja i/ili cue list po jednoj konverziji

entry.string: Select the folder of the CDDB database

section.name: Errors

entry.string: Please enter a valid eMail address.

The freedb CDDBP protocol cannot be used over HTTP Forward proxies!
Would you like to change the protocol to HTTP?

section.entry:
freedb CDDBP protokol ne može se koristiti preko HTTP prenaupućenih proksija!
Da li želite da izmenite protokol u HTTP?

section.name: Tags

entry.string: Replace existing comments with default comment
Add reference to audio file tag

section.entry: Dodaj referencu u tag audio fajla

entry.string: Read cue sheets embedded in metadata

section.entry: Očitaj cue listove usađene u podacima

entry.string: Prefer cue sheets over chapter information

section.entry: Daj prednost cue listovova nad informacijama o poglavljima

entry.string: Prepend zero to track numbers below 10

section.entry: Dodaj nulu ispred brojeva manjih od 10

section.name: Verification

entry.string: Verify that lossless inputs decode to exactly the data they were originally created from.

section.entry: Overi da su ulazi bez gubitaka tačno dekodovani u fajlove iz kojih su prvobitno nastali

entry.string: Verify that lossless outputs decode to exactly the data used when encoding them.

section.entry: Overi da su izlazi bez gubitaka tačno dekodovani u fajlove koji su korišćeni kada su enkodovani

section.name: Processing

entry.string: Conversion to a single output file
Treat the combined tracks like a single track

section.entry: Tretiraj kombinovane pesme kao jednu pesmu

section.name: About

entry.string: This program is being distributed under the terms of the GNU General Public License (GPL).

section.entry: Ovaj program se distribuira pod uslovima GNU Opštih javnih dozvola (GPL).

section.name: Updates

entry.string: There are new updates for %1 available online! Would you like to see a list of available updates now?

section.entry: Postoje nadogradnje za %1 na internetu! Da li želite da vidite listu raspoloživih nadogradnji sada?

entry.string: There are no updates available at the moment!

%1 can perform an automatic check for online program updates at startup.
Would you like %1 to look for updates at startup?

section.entry:
Prilikom pokretanja %1 može automatski proveriti da li ima nadogradnji na internetu.
Da li želite da %1 potraži nadogradnje prilikom pokretanja?

section.name: Messages

entry.string: A conversion process is still active! Do you really want to quit?

section.entry: Enkodovanje u toku! Da li zaista želite da ga otkažete?

entry.string:
This option will remove the original files from your computer after the encoding process!
Are you sure you want to activate this function?

section.entry:
Ova opcija briše izvorne fajlove sa računara nakon enkodovanja!
Da li ste sigurni da želite da omogućite ovu funkciju?

entry.string: Keep this option enabled even after restarting %1

section.entry: Zadrži ovu opciju omogućenom i nakon ponovnog pokretanja %1

entry.string: The output file %1 already exists! Do you want to overwrite it?

section.entry: Izlazni fajl %1 već postoji! Da li želite da ga prepišete?

entry.string:
You seem to be converting from a lossy to a lossless format.
Please be aware that quality loss cannot be undone, so this process will not improve quality in any way, and most likely increase file size.
Would you like to continue anyway?

section.entry:
Izgleda da konvertujete iz formata sa gubicima u format bez gubitaka.
Obratite pažnju da je gubitak kvaliteta trajan i nepovratan, tako da ovaj proces neće poboljšati kvalitet ni na koji način, a verovatno će uvećati veličinu fajla.
Da li želite da nastavite bez obzira na sve?

section.name: Errors

entry.string:
Could not create decoder component: %1
File: %1 Path: %2

section.entry:
Nije moguće kreirati komponentu dekodera: %1
Fajl: %1 Putanja: %2

entry.string:
Could not set up decoder for input file: %1
File: %1 Path: %2
Error: %3

section.entry:
Nije moguće podešenje dekodera za ulazni fajl: %1
Fajl: %1 Putanja: %2
Greška: %3

entry.string:
Could not set up encoder for output file: %1
File: %1 Path: %2
Error: %3

section.entry:
Nije moguće podešenje enkodera za izlazni fajl: %1
Fajl: %1 Putanja: %2
Greška: %3

entry.string:
Could not set up DSP processor: %1
Error: %2

section.entry:
Nije moguće podesiti DSP procesor: %1
Greška: %2

entry.string:
Unable to access input file: %1
File: %1 Path: %2

section.entry:
Nije moguć pristup ulaznom fajlu: %1
Fajl: %1 Folder: %2

entry.string:
Unable to create output file: %1
File: %1 Path: %2

section.entry:
Nije moguće kreiranje izlaznog fajla: %1
Fajl: %1 Folder: %2

entry.string:
Checksum mismatch verifying output file: %1
Encode checksum: %2 Verify checksum: %3

section.entry:
Checksum se ne poklapa prilikom overe izlaznog fajla: %1
Enkodovanje checksum-a: %2 Overa checksum-a: %3

entry.string: Unable to load NT SCSI drivers! CD ripping disabled!

section.entry: Nije moguće učitati NT SCSI drajvere! Ripovanje CD-a otkazano!

entry.string: Cannot play a CD track while ripping from the same drive!

section.entry: Nije moguća reprodukcija CD-a u toku ripovanja istog!

entry.string: Cannot start ripping while playing a track from the same drive!

section.entry: Nije moguće započeti ripovanje u toku reprodukcije!

entry.string: CDDB support is disabled! Please enable local or remote CDDB support in the configuration dialog.

section.entry: CDDB podrška je onemogućena! Molimo omogućite lokalnu ili udaljenu CDDB podršku u postavkama.

entry.string: Remote CDDB support is disabled! Please enable remote CDDB support in the configuration dialog.

section.entry: Udaljena CDDB podrška onemogućena! Molimo omogućite CDDB podršku u postavkama podešenja.

entry.string:
Access to CD-ROM drives was denied by Windows.
Please contact your system administrator in order to be granted the right to access the CD-ROM drive.

section.entry:
Pristup CD ROM uređaju odbijen od strane Windowsa.
Molimo obratite se administratoru sistema da Vam odobri pristup CD ROM uređaju.

entry.string: The selected folder does not exist anymore!

section.name: Overwrite

entry.string: The following %1 files already exist or have duplicate file names

section.entry: Naredni %1 fajl/ovi već postoji/e ili ima/ju dupli/e naziv/e

section.name: Format

entry.string: The selected tracks have different sample formats. Please select the desired sample format of the output file:

section.entry: Odabrane pesme imaju različite formate semplova. Molimo odaberite željeni format sempla izlaznog fajla:

section.name: Ripper

entry.string: Read ISRC when adding tracks to joblist

section.entry: Čitaj ISRC kada dodaješ pesme na listu zadataka

section.name: CueSheet

entry.string: Prefer cue sheet metadata over referenced files' tags

section.entry: Preferiraj cue list podatke nad tagovima referentnih fajlova

entry.string: Look for compressed alternatives if referenced Wave files cannot be located

section.entry: Potraži spakovane fajlove ako nije moguće lociranje odnosnih fajlova

entry.string: Ignore errors during cue sheet processing

section.entry: Ignoriši greške u toku obrade "cue" listova

entry.string: Maximum AAC frequency bandwidth to use (Hz)

section.name: Format

entry.string: Allow ID3v2 tags in AAC files

section.entry: Dozvoli ID3v2 tagove u AAC fajlovima

entry.string: Some players may have problems playing AAC files with ID3 tags attached. Please use this option only if you are sure that your player can handle these tags.

section.entry: Neki plejeri imaju probleme sa pokretanjem AAC fajlova sa ID3 tagovima. Molimo koristite ovu opciju samo ako ste sigurni da Vaš plejer to može.

section.name: Expert

entry.string: You can specify multiple functions separated by semicolons.

section.entry: Možete zadati više funkcija odvajajući ih tačka-zarezom.

section.name: WMA

entry.string: Automatically select format based on settings and input format

section.entry: Automatski odaberi format baziran na podešenjima i ulaznom formatu

section.name: Opus
section.entry: Omogući enkodovanje sa promenljivom stopom bitova
Ograniči stopu bitova na ciljanu vrednost

section.name: Errors

entry.string: Could not find suitable audio format.
Unable to use selected audio format.

section.entry: Nije moguće koristiti odabrani audio format.

section.name: meh!

entry.string: Create a separate folder for each output format

section.entry: Napravi zaseban folder za svaki izlazni format

section.name: Messages

entry.string:
Your CD drive could not be found in the AccurateRip database.
Drive name: %1
Would you like to run an automatic drive offset detection now?

section.entry:
Vaš CD uređaj nije nađen u AccurateRip bazi.
Naziv uređaja: %1
Da li želite da pokrenete samodetekciju offseta drajva sada?

entry.string: The inserted disc could not be found in the AccurateRip database.

section.entry: Ubačen disk nije nađen u AccurateRip bazi.

entry.string:
Please insert another disc into the CD drive and click OK.
The disc must be present in the AccurateRip database. The chance for this is highest for popular CDs that have likely been ripped by other users before.

section.entry:
Molimo ubacite drugi disk u CD uređaj i kliknite OK.
Disk se mora nalaziti u AccurateRip bazi. Verovatnoća za ovo jeis viša je za popularne diskove koji su verovatno već ripovani ranije od strane drugih korisnika.

entry.string: Offset detection needs to check another disc.

section.entry: Ofset detekcija zahteva proveru drugog diska.

entry.string: The drive offset has been successfully detected and configured to %1 samples.

section.entry: Ofset drajva uspešno je detektovan i podešen na %1 sempla.

section.name: Donate

entry.string: Please help keep this software free by supporting the %1 project with a donation.

section.entry: Molimo pomozite da ovaj program ostane besplatan podržavajući %1 projekat donacijom.

entry.string: Please write to %1 if you would like to mail a check or send money by mail.

section.entry: Molimo pišite na %1 ako želite da donirate putem elektronskog transfera, pošaljete ček poštom, ili da pošaljete novac poštom.

section.name: PayPal

entry.string: Choose an amount and click the button to make a donation with PayPal:

section.entry: Kliknite na jedno od dugmića ispod za donaciju preko PayPal-a:

entry.string: You can also send money directly to %1 with PayPal.

section.entry: Takođe, možete izravno poslati novac %1-u putem PayPal-a.

section.name: Donorbox

entry.string: Donorbox enables quick and simple donations by credit card. Click this button to make a donation with Donorbox:

section.entry: Donorbox omogućava brze i jednostavne donacije kreditnom karticom. Kliknite na ovo dugme da donirate purem Donorbox-a:

section.name: Bitcoin

entry.string: Please scan or click the QR code or copy the following address to donate Bitcoin:

section.entry: Molimo skenirajte ili kliknite na QR kod ili kopirajte sledeću adresu da donirate Bitcoin:

entry.string: This address also accepts Bitcoin Cash and other forks.

section.entry: Ova adresa takođe prihvata Bitkoin Cash i ostale valute.

section.name: Ethereum

entry.string: Please scan or click the QR code or copy the following address to donate Ethereum:

section.entry: Molimo skenirajte ili kliknite na QR kod ili kopirajte sledeću adresu da donirate Ethereum:

entry.string: This address also accepts Ether Classic and ERC20 tokens.

section.entry: Ova adresa takođe prihvata Ether Classic i ERC20 tokene.

section.name: SEPA

entry.string: You can donate by making an electronic transfer to the following account:

section.entry: Možete donirati putem elektronskog transfera na sledeći račun:

section.name: Video Downloader

entry.string: Automatically download URLs copied to clipboard

section.entry: Automatski preuzmi URL-ove koji su sačuvani u klipbordu

section.name: Configuration

entry.string: Select the folder to save downloaded video files to

section.entry: Odaberi folder za čuvanje preuzetih video fajlova

section.name: Errors

entry.string: This URL is not supported or not a video page URL!

section.entry: Ovaj URL nije podržan ili nije video URL!

entry.string: You are already downloading this video!

Some required video decoders could not be found. Video files cannot be added to the joblist for conversion to audio files.
Please install FFmpeg or avconv to fix this problem!

section.entry:
Neki neophodni video dekoderi ne mogu biti nađeni. Video fajlovi ne mogu biti dodati na listu zadataka za pretvaranje u audio fajlove.
Molimo instalirajte FFmpeg ili avconv da rešite ovaj problem!

entry.string: Clear album artist field if it matches track artist

section.entry: Očistite polje izvođač kada se poklopi sa izvođačem pesme

entry.string: Show Logs tab in main window

section.entry: Prikaži dnevnik događaja u glavnom prozoru

entry.string: Select the folder for saving log files

section.entry: Izaberite folder za čuvanje fajlova dnevnika događaja
Izbrišite stare fajlove dnevnika događaja nakon

entry.string: Save conversion logs with audio files

section.entry: Sačuvajte dnevnike konverzija sa audio fajlovima
